local_schema.longdesc: Ubukhulu besandi, ngepesenti, phakathi kwe 0 ne 100

local_schema.short_desc: Nokuba ngaba ifestile engundoqo ihlale phezulu
local_schema.longdesc: Nokuba ngaba ifestile engundoqo kufuneka ihlale phezu kwezinye

Uhlobo lweziphumo lwesandi lokusetyenizswa: "0" yeyestiriyo, i"1" yeziphumo siqhagamshelanisi sesi 4, i"2" yesiphumo zesiqhagamshelanisi isi 5.0, "3" yeziphumo zesiqhagamshelanisi sesi 5.1, i"4" yePassthrough ye AC3.

local_schema.short_desc: Nokuba ngaba kwenzeke ukulungisa isiphene sisenzelwa injini yokudlala umva
Tshintsha ubungakanani beskrini sokuzobela ngokuzenzekelayo kwisilayishi sefayili
Bonisa iziphumo zentelekelelo xa kungekho vidiyo iboniswe kwiskrini
local_schema.longdesc: Bonisa iziphumo xa udlala ifayili yesandi kuphela.
